title: mri_aparc2aseg
description: Maps the cortical labels from the automatic cortical parcellation to the automatic segmentation volume.

subject.title: Subject name
subject.description: Name of the subject as found in the SUBJECTS_DIR.

output_volfile.title: Output Volume File
output_volfile.description: Full path of file to save the output segmentation in. Default is mri/aparc+aseg.mgz

old_ribbon.title: Old Ribbon Flag
old_ribbon.description: Use mri/hemi.ribbon.mgz as a mask for the cortex

new_ribbon.title: New Ribbon Flag
new_ribbon.description: Mask cortical voxels with mri/ribbon.mgz. Same as --volmask

annot_name.title: Annotation Name
annot_name.description: Use annotname surface annotation. By default, uses ?h.aparc.annot.

base_offset.title: Base Offset
base_offset.description: Add offset to all segmentation ids.

label_wm.title: Label WM Flag
label_wm.description: Re-assign white matter voxel labels to the closest cortical point if within distance.

wmparc_dmax.title: WM Parc DM
wmparc_dmax.description: Max distance (mm) from cortex to be labeled as gyral WM (default 5mm)

rip_unknown.title: Rip Unknown Flag
rip_unknown.description: Do not label WM based on 'unknown' cortical label

no_fix_parahip.title: No Fix Parahip Flag
no_fix_parahip.description: Do not remove unconnected regions from WM parahip

smooth_normals.title: Smooth Normals
smooth_normals.description: Change number of surface normal smoothing steps (default is 10).

crs_test.title: CRS Test
crs_test.description: Test mapping of column, row, slice

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Run in parallel with the specified number of threads

help.title: Help Flag
help.description: Print out information on how to use this program
